title.rendered: Monkey Joe’s at Kid’s Corner on 6/22!

content.rendered:
This Week’s Kid’s Corner

Join us at the Warner Robins store for Kid’s Corner on 6/22. Our special guest will be Monkey Joe’s! We will have a reading at 10:00 a.m. and again at 11:00 a.m. See you there!

 

Kid’s Corner 2017

Last week we had a total of 96 kids join us for Kid’s Corner between the Macon and Warner Robins locations. We had a lot of fun hanging with the Chick-fil-A® Kid Cow in Macon and learning about adoption with Covenant Care in Warner Robins. Thank you for making us part of your summer fun!

excerpt.rendered: Join us at the Warner Robins store for Kid’s Corner on 6/22. Our special guest will be Monkey Joe’s!
